alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 7:04PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Otsego, northwestern Delaware and central Chenango Counties through 745 PM EST... At 703 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from South Brookfield to Smithville Flats. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Norwich, Davenport, Guilford, Worcester, Middlefield, Hartwick, Maryland, Cooperstown and Edmeston. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 12 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for central New York.
